title: ThrowBLACK Thursday
itunes:title: ThrowBLACK Thursday
description:
The Breakfast Club is joined by the man who got the ball rolling on "Black Lives Matter", Mr. DeRay McKesson. He speaks on everything from the movement's end goal and current police-citizen relations to Beyonce following him on twitter and how he only drinks WHITE wine! (Did someone just say "All wines matter"?!?)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
